File /std/basic/scroll_base.c

This is the basic control file for scrolls. It contains all the common scroll handling stuff that goes into both the object and the shadow.

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/basic/scroll_book_react.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/tasks.h
